content: Determine exactly one command to use, and respond using the format specified above:

Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: an overview of Python's history, design philosophy, features, and implementation. Python emphasizes simplicity, readability, and extensibility through modules, and supports multiple programming paradigms. Its large standard library and third-party packages make it well-suited for a wide range of tasks, and it is available on various platforms. However, the text does not provide a clear statement of Python's philosophy.

Links: ['Jump to content (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Python_(programming_language)#bodyContent)', 'Main page (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page)', 'Contents (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Contents)', 'Current events (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Portal:Current_events)', 'Random article (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:Random)']
